name: Circuit Defender
description:
Description

Circuit Defender is a classic tower defense game, with small adjustments to the gameplay. In Circuit Defender you defend circuit boards and components from ESD, by building turrets before they reach your components or the end of the path. 

Repair your components, when they get damaged by the electron. Build more component turrets, to defend your components to get damaged and die. 

Follow Circuit Defender on Facebook for Devlog Features
  • Realistic circuits and components
  • Turrets that looks like a component
  • Low poly and fast graphics
Controls
  • A, D, W, S is used to move around
  • C is used to move down
  • Space is used to move up
  • Mouse is used for looking around
  • B is used for open the buy menu
  • Espace is used to pause the game

You will be able to change and see the controls in-game, in the options menu, later in the development stage of the game.
